title: Han thlir ilangin
lyrics:
Han thlir ilangin
Kalvari tlanga thihna hmun saw;
Khawvel Chhandamtu kan Lal Isu-a
Lungngaih leh thlaphanin amah an bawm.

A kalna tur chu aw, ka thlir ngam lo,
Juda mipui leh hmelmate karah,
Ka hreng ropui vanga ka Lal Isua.

Aw, i hmangaihna
Lungngaih fawn velin Kalvari-ah
Keini min tlan ta, vak bo retheite,
Aw ka sual faina i thisen hlu chu.

He khawvelah hian
Vaivai, retheite min rawn zawng ta;
I angchhung muanna ka thlen hma loh chuan,
Ka rawn zawng zel che, aw, ka Chhandamtu.
